statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%'
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE age < 40
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, age, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_plan, treatment_date FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM patients INNER JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' AND age >= 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT name, age, treatment_plan FROM patients INNER JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, doctor_name, record_date FROM medical_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, admission_date FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis, discharge_date FROM patients WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND admission_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr. Smith%' ORDER BY record_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, age, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM medical_records WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Johnson') ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='F' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';

SELECT m.medication_name, t.date_prescribed, p.patient_name FROM Medications m JOIN Treatments t ON m.medication_id = t.medication_id JOIN MedicalRecords r ON t.record_id = r.record_id JOIN Patients p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE p.gender='M';
SELECT p.patient_name, r.date_created, r.diagnosis FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.date_created >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY r.date_created ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost < 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patients;
SELECT treatment_name, cost, duration, side_effects FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, physician_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT physician_name, specialization, years_experience FROM physicians WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT outcome_id, appointment_id, outcome_description FROM outcomes WHERE follow_up_required = TRUE;
